base_frame.description: The undistortion algorithm is based on a base frame, which must be the same as the twist frame.

use_imu.description: Use IMU angular velocity, otherwise, use twist angular velocity.

use_3d_distortion_correction.description: Use 3d distortion correction algorithm, otherwise, use 2d distortion correction algorithm.

update_azimuth_and_distance.description: Flag to update the azimuth and distance values of each point after undistortion. If set to false, the azimuth and distance values will remain unchanged after undistortion, resulting in a mismatch with the updated x, y, z coordinates.

has_static_tf_only.description: Flag to indicate if only static TF is used.
